Text: How do I handle this situation?
Option1: Employee 1 is in the wrong and needs to be diciplined.
Option2: Some sort of middle ground can be found.
Option3: Employee 2 is in the wrong and needs to be diciplined

Option1: They should be made to appologise to Employee 2 for yelling.
Option2: They should be reprimanded for their promise on behalf of the company.
Option3: They should appologise and be told why ITS4 doesn't make those promises.

Option1: Both of them should be made to appologise for yelling.
Option2: Employee 2 should be repremanded for starting office conflict| but Employee 1 should apologise to Employee 2.
Option3: Employee 1 should be remprimanded for being unethical| but Employee 2 should appologise too.

Option1: They should be made to appologise to Employee 1 for yelling.
Option2: They should be reprimanded for starting an office fight.
Option3: They should appologise and be told why what Employee 1 did is not something to get upset about.
